items.sentence: Tom doesn\'t get along with Mary\'s parents.
Everyone except Tom is planning to be there.
Find Tom and ask him what you just asked me.
Tom has already told Mary about the meeting.
Tom is going to ask Mary if she can do that.
Tom said he\'d never try to do that at home.
Tom said he\'s tried doing that three times.
Tom said stuff about Mary that wasn\'t true.
Tom said that Mary wasn\'t enjoying herself.
Didn\'t you know Tom used to live in Boston?
Tom lived in a homeless shelter for a while.
Tom lived in a town not too far from Boston.
Tom told Mary why he was late for her party.
Tom told everyone he was through doing that.
Tom didn\'t feel he needed to wait for Mary.
Do you really think Tom will come back here?
Do you really think we should be doing this?
It looks like Tom doesn\'t enjoy doing that.
I wasn\'t aware Tom didn\'t have to do that.
Who did Tom think would cook dinner for him?
Why Tom did that is beyond my comprehension.
Tom could hardly afford to pay for his meal.
Tom could tell something was bothering Mary.
Tom has been at Mary\'s house all afternoon.
I heard that Tom spoke with Mary about that.
I hope Mary knows how much I care about her.
I hope someone famous sings one of my songs.
Do you think that Tom would like to do that?
Does Tom still practice the piano every day?
I\'ll be at Tom\'s for at least three hours.
Tom never seems to spend much time studying.
Tom never should have gone there by himself.
You had no way of knowing that would happen.
Did Tom know about Mary\'s drinking problem?
Well, Tom, you aren\'t what I was expecting.
Tom certainly can\'t expect to live with us.
We really should sing a little more quietly.
Tom is making a list of what has to be done.
We shouldn\'t have eaten breakfast so early.
We\'ll drive you to the airport if you like.
I want to spend the whole weekend in Boston.
I want to talk to you about the other night.
There\'s got to be an easier way to do that.
How has Boston changed since you were a kid?
How long are you going to be gone this time?
It looks as if it\'s going to be a nice day.
Do you really believe that\'s what happened?
I\'ve heard that Tom asked you to marry him.
I\'ve heard that Tom is now studying French.
I wasn\'t surprised Tom was able to do that.
